name: restack
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to stack a number of things (= arrange them in an ordered pile) again: The game involves racing to stack, unstack, and restack a dozen plastic cups in specific formations. I organized and restacked all my journals.
to fill something such as a shelf again, when it has become empty: The shop staff never stop working; at every opportunity they are cleaning windows or re-stacking shelves. She emptied and restacked the dishwasher while she waited for everyone to get up.
